amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to increase and decrease funding for the Internal Revenue Service by $5,000 with the intent to direct the agency to provide Congress with the quantity and types(s) of: weapons, weapons systems, ammunition, explosive devices, armored vehicles, drones/UAVs, and chemical weapons such as tear gas and calming agents in their possession.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bice amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bice amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bice amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
